Package controllers

Class SHHController

java.lang.Object
controllers.SHHController
public class SHHController
extends java.lang.Object
responsible for the SHHTab it is the controller of the SHHTab dashboard would load this tab and view in their setMainController

    • monitorTemp

      public void monitorTemp()
      When this method is called, it means that the temperature of a room or outside changed then when check if we are in summer, compare rooms with outside temp to see if we open the windows then we check if the windows are blocked, if they are send a message Also checks to see if rooms temperatures goes below 0 and sends message if so

      Returns:
